--==_Exmh_-178228168P
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

> From:  Stephen Hocking <shocking@houston.rr.com>
> Date:  Thu, 25 Jul 2002 09:49:46 -0500
>
> As far as I understand, exmh also does some direct file access to do
> things, so the daemon would also have to be able to duplicate this,
> and the relevant bits inside exmh would have to be tweaked.

It does.  If anybody in the nmh world actually gets to the point of actually 
implementing imap access, this will need to change, but until there exists an 
environment where the direct access doesn't work, we're not going to take the 
performance hit.

Chris
